org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.commands

Class CommandScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.commands.CommandScheduler

  • public class CommandScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for running commands. Determines when it should run a command based on the state of required subsystems.
    Author:
    Enlil Odisho

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Command> active
      List storing all commands that are running.
      private java.util.HashMap<Subsystem,Command> busySubsystems
      Hash map containing all subsystems that are being used along with the command that's using them.
      private static CommandScheduler instance
      Static variable containing an instance of CommandScheduler.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Command> queue
      List storing all commands awaiting execution.

      Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CommandScheduler getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance of CommandScheduler.
        Returns:
        Instance of CommandScheduler.

      • scheduleCommand

        public void scheduleCommand(Command command)
        Add command to command scheduler queue. It will be executed when it's subsystem dependencies are available.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to add.

      • getCommandUsingSubsystem

        public Command getCommandUsingSubsystem(Subsystem subsystem)
        Retrieves the command that is using a particular subsystem. Returns null if subsystem is not being used by any command.
        Parameters:
        subsystem - Subsystem that is being used by command.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Called every interval.

      • updateActiveCommands

        private void updateActiveCommands()
        Updates the active and busy subsystems lists. Should be called every tick().
